name: CiRCA6
description:
CiRCA6 (A GAME ABOUT CIRCLES) is a minimalist game about reflexes and strategy and circles, with a simple goal... survive as long as you can.

Navigate the screen using a single joystick to propel yourself forward, destroying endless waves of enemies with your wake.

What CiRCA6 may lack in geometric variety, it makes up for with finely tuned controls and exciting gameplay that will continually test your abilities.


"Maddeningly fun, addicting, and frustrating all at the same time" - AppSaga

"Definitely worth any gamer's play time" - TheAppleGoogle

"Minimalistic but entertaining..." - 148Apps

"A fun challenging experience" - IndieGameEnthusiast

"CiRCA6's basic charms mean it's always good for a quick blast" - Pocket Gamer
